title: BrainSkin
description: A program to create an unfolded surface that wraps the brain (skin) and Gyrification Indices.

stitch_surface.title: Stitch Surface
stitch_surface.description: A bunch of triangles for closing the surface.

reduced_skin_surface.title: Reduced Skin Surface
reduced_skin_surface.description: Reduced mesh version of initial skin surface.

inflated_skin_surface.title: Inflated Skin Surface
inflated_skin_surface.description: Original surface inflated inside skin surface.

node_pairs_results.title: Node Pairs Results
node_pairs_results.description: Results of computations for finding node pairs that span sulci.

inflating_surface_results.title: Inflating Surface Results
inflating_surface_results.description: Results of computations for inflating initial surface inside skin surface.

segments_display.title: Segments Display Object
segments_display.description: Segments between node pairs spanning sulci.
